attributes.description:
BB Motor Group is a well-established franchise with a wide variety of new & pre-owned vehicles, service departments & parts. As part of a 60-year legacy, we strive to exceed the expectations of all potential & existing customers. To establish & ensure peace of mind, trust and long lasting relationships with our clients, a detailed workshop quality inspection is done on each of our pre-loved vehicles, along with a roadworthy test, full valet & body polish.
Our excellent sales manager, Werner Delport, works closely with his team to ensure competitive offers & excellent service is produced. Request a call back & one of our pre-loved professionals will contact you.
We welcome all trade-ins & deliver nation-wide on request.
#BBWelkom #ExceedingAllExpectations

The Reinvented 3 series with the pioneering design language, stands for the dawning of a new era, propelling the ultimate sports sedan. 
The new-look 3 Series is unmistakably BMW, yet shows off an advanced look. The pervading impression that the G20 instills is one of accomplishment. 
It seems everything (inside and out) about the 3 Series was meticulously thought out and engineered. 
There’s generous room for the family and it’s well equipped. That it’s so enjoyable to drive on the way home from a tedious business meeting makes it one of the most rounded, most satisfying cars you can own.

Nationwide delivery.
T&C's apply.
e&oe

Bakkies are sure a South African favorite, and there is no argument when it comes to this tough Ford Ranger, spotting subtle changes to the previous segment, it sure is a workhorse and will get any job done on the road or off-road. Whether it is towing a trailer load of furniture between homes or a caravan for a weekend away, the Ranger is up to the job. Even with the heavy load, it seamlessly pulls off without hassle
